abnormalities.Fasting Blood Glucose: High blood sugar can lead to diabetes
abnormalities.HbA1c: Indicates poor blood sugar control over time

explanation: The report shows elevated blood glucose and cholesterol levels that require attention through diet and lifestyle changes.
